duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble components, package, tape, label, and manually lift products.
Rotate through all tasks required in the production process.
Load, unload, and arrange materials and supplies as needed.
Notify team leader of product discrepancies and equipment malfunctions.
Assist in the training of other employees and provide backup support to the machine operator.
Meet and maintain productivity requirements and proficient in all safety and housekeeping requirements.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED preferred. 0 to 1 yr. related experience or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
